description: The parameter logshipping_async_buffer_size controls logshipping buffer size.

queries.name: q_async_replication_mode
queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM M_SYSTEM_REPLICATION WHERE REPLICATION_MODE = 'ASYNC'

queries.name: q_logshipping_async_buffer_size
queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS VALUE FROM M_INIFILE_CONTENTS WHERE FILE_NAME = 'indexserver.ini'  AND SECTION = 'system_replication' AND KEY = 'logshipping_async_buffer_size' AND CAST(VALUE AS INTEGER) >= 1073741824

actions.description: During a full data shipment and if system replication is disconnected, replication has to start from scratch. In order to reduce the risk of buffer full situations, parameter logshipping_async_buffer_size can be adjusted to 1GB on the primary site.However, please note that you can adjust this value to a higher or lower based on the specific needs and workload of your environment.

references: SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,1999880 - FAQ: SAP HANA System Replication, https://me.sap.com/notes/1999880
